title: Home
content:
Hello,

My name is Adam Spruijt, I am a Web Design­er, Developer and the Cre­at­ive Dir­ect­or of Niagara Falls Tour­ism. In my roll I design and devel­op all aspects of the web­site, advert­ising and pub­lic­a­tions (issuu) start to fin­ish. I also handle the a large amount of our pho­to­graphy (Flickr) and videography.

I have more than 10 years of exper­i­ence cre­at­ing excep­tion­al products for cli­ents from a range of fields.

In my freel­ance work I design, devel­op and host all of my cli­ents’ sites. I believe the tight integ­ra­tion of every level of a web­site cre­ates an end product of unmatched qual­ity. See the below links for a few live examples:

  • Top of Clifton Hill 
  • Elect Gil for Region
  • Decoder Ring Theatre
